search_results.title: Lois Shearing – Author, journalist, organiser
search_results.snippet: Lois Shearing is the author of Bi The Way: The Bisexual Guide to Life, and co-editor of It Ain't Over Til the Bisexual Speaks: an anthology of bisexual voices.

search_results.title: Lois Shearing
search_results.snippet: Lois Shearing is a bi activist, freelance journalist and writer based in London. They are the founder of the Bisexual Survivors Network.
